If you dont know the Vendor and Model of the camera you can leave it as unknown. 

If you know the Vendor but not the model - use the default option. 

From the Vendor & Model we will try to work out the Snapshot URL ending. 

 If you want to report a new vendor/model, please send us a feedback from the main menu.
The URL ending is not editable for the selected model. \n\n If you want to modify the URL ending, please select \'Unknown/Other\' as vendor name or select \'Default\' as model name.
The IP address you provided is a local IP address, we support external IP addresses only.\n\nDo you still want to precede?
